title: Any utilities for OS X that check kerning pairs?
content:
I need an OS X utiliy or font manager of some kind (like Typograf for Windows) that simply displays the number of kerning pairs for a given font.

I know that Suitcase Fusion with Font Sense does this, but that’s a bit much just to check for kerning. Font Book, which comes with OS X Tiger, is nice and simple but gives no kerning info.

Thanks.
